Town there is a plaza or square , called Of the Martyrdoms . Until about thirty years ago , there was a block of dwelling - houses on the western side of this square , which attracted the notice of visitors . Though the other buildings in the square were gay or smart , with flowers , colours and lights , these were always dingy , by decree .
